hibernate-mapping.query: select V.id as id, V.postId as postId, V.commentId as commentId, V.value as value, V.userId as userId from Vote V where V.userId = :userId
select V.id as id, V.postId as postId, V.commentId as commentId, V.value as value, V.userId as userId from Vote V where V.postId = :postId and V.userId = :userId
